8081.description: Port for Sickbeard Web interface. Suggested default: 8081.
8081.label: WebUI port

/download.description: Choose a share to download to.
/download.label: Data Storage

/tv.description: Choose a share to host shows.
/tv.label: Config TV

PUID.description: Enter a valid UID to run sickbeard as. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PUID.label: UID to run sickbeard as.

PGID.description: Enter a valid GID to use along with the above UID. It(or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PGID.label: GID to run sickbeard as.
